snippet: A Qaeda affiliate is operating terrorist training camps in northern Mali and using momentum there to recruit across sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Europe, Gen. Carter F. Ham said.
abstract: Gen Carter F Ham, top American military commander in Africa, says that Al Qaeda in Islamic Maghreb is operating terrorist training camps in northern Mali and providing arms, explosives and financing to Boko Haram, militant Islamist organization in northern Nigeria.
lead_paragraph: A Qaeda affiliate is operating terrorist training camps in northern Mali and using momentum there to recruit across sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Europe, Gen. Carter F. Ham said.

headline.seo: Gen. Carter F. Ham Details Al Qaeda Influence in Mali
headline.main: American Commander Details Al Qaeda’s Strength in Mali
headline.print_headline: American Commander Details Al Qaeda’s Strength in Mali
